data.title: Why a community garden now?
data.hook: Urban gardens boost food security and spark neighbourhood pride.
data.context: Our vacant lot sits between two apartment blocks and currently collects trash after the weekend market.
data.essentialQuestion: How can we convert the lot into a productive shared space within six weeks?

data.title: Pitch your garden lane
data.goal: Share the priority that will make your design work for neighbours and volunteers.
prompts: What evidence convinced you this priority matters?
Who will benefit first if we get this right?
What support do you need from partner teams?

roles.label: Soil health team
roles.value: Show soil test notes and your raised bed layout.

roles.label: Water and irrigation
roles.value: Explain how you will tap the existing spigot and keep hoses safe.

roles.label: Storytellers
roles.value: Share a resident quote and propose a sign or social post.

evidence: Upload sketches or diagrams to the shared folder before reporting.
Capture at least one community voice in your summary.
